1.16.5.voidtotem-1.16.5-1.1.0:
Additions:
- curios compatibility (a slot for the totem)
- visible effects for all players around the player who was saved with the totem
Tweaks and code improvements
1.16.5.voidtotem-1.16.5-1.1.1:
Fixed bugs:
- player can't be killed by /kill command when void totem equipped
- if totem in curios slot and hand, 2 totems were removed
1.16.5.voidtotem-1.16.5-1.2.0:
Additions:
- a config to just need to have the totem anywhere in your inventory
- version support for 1.16-3-1.16.5

Improved and commented code
1.16.5.voidtotem-1.16.5-1.3.0:
Additions:
- a new advancement fired when you use a void totem to save you from death
- a config to disable the tooltip for the void totem and to disabled the end city treasure
- end city treasure loot for the void totem

Improved code and small tweaks
1.16.5.voidtotem-1.16.5-1.4.0:
Changes:
- better teleportation by saving the last block pos to nbt

small fixes and tweaks
